FROM ubuntu:18.10

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y vim gem ruby-dev make gcc g++ python-setuptools && \
    gem install bundler && \
    cp /usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Berlin /etc/localtime && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
